titles.title: Expressing support for designation of April 2010 as Student Financial Aid Awareness Month to raise awareness of student financial aid.
Expressing support for designation of April 2010 as Student Financial Aid Awareness Month to raise awareness of student financial aid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of Student Financial Aid Awareness Month.
Encourages students and families across this country to participate in Student Financial Aid Awareness Month.
